body_html: @F3PiX yes, about that: The last commit to jshint master was more than 2 years ago (quasi 2 millennia in javascript time), I think it might be time to drop it from the build process? Of course I can also edit this PR to not use ES6 syntax if that is the consensus.

body: @F3PiX yes, about that: The last commit to jshint master was more than 2 years ago (quasi 2 millennia in javascript time), I think it might be time to drop it from the build process? Of course I can also edit this PR to not use ES6 syntax if that is the consensus.
